attributes.action: an armed forces fit for purpose
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For to long the MOD and Treasury have put lives at risk by cutting armed forces,  much needed Equipment and by shrinking the force size by mothballing.
Mothballed equipment rarely if at all returns to service either due to cost or being obsolete. This is cost cutting and should stop.
New equipment should be built as it was   accepted at main gate and not have its   capabilities downgraded before commission. Penny pinching  in this fashion leaves equipment that either does not work, leaving costly equipment unable to accept midlife upgrades,  therefore costing more on the grounds it needs replacing early or worst still costing lives. 

As members of the British Public we should expect the following:
Proper protection for our armed forces.
the Right to be able to trust our government to deliver the best equipment  for our men and women to use to defend this country and its people.

please support our armed forces
thank you
